original: iha khalu bhagavān kapilo munirāsuraye 'nukampayā pañcaviṃśatitattvānyupadiśya sūtrayāmāsa /
analyzed: iha khalu bhagavān kapilaḥ muniḥ āsuraye nukampayā pañcaviṃśati tattvāni upadiśya sūtrayāmāsa
pradhānam prakṛtiḥ avyaktam avyākṛtam ca iti anarthāntaram
ahaṃkāraḥ bhimāna lakṣaṇaḥ vaikṛtikaḥ taijasaḥ bhūtādiḥ ca iti trividhaḥ
tanmātrāṇi tu pañca śabda tanmātram ākāśa hetuḥ
iti pañca tanmātrāṇi iti aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ
tatra śrotra tvac cakṣuḥ rasana ghrāṇa ākhyāni buddhīndriyāṇi śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandha ālocana vṛttīni
vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthāni karmendriyāṇi vacana ādāna viharaṇa utsarga ānanda vṛttīni
jñāna kriyā śakti dvaya ātmakam saṅkalpa vikalpa lakṣaṇam manaḥ iti ekādaśa indriyāṇi
bhūtāni ca ākāśa vāyu tejaḥ salila pṛthivī lakṣaṇāni pañca iti ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ

original: puruṣo 'nekastriguṇarahito vivekī aviṣayo 'sādhāraṇo 'prasavadharmā cetanaḥ sākṣī kevalo madhyastho draṣṭā 'kartā ca //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ nekaḥ triguṇa rahitaḥ vivekī aviṣayaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ prasava dharmā cetanaḥ sākṣī kevalaḥ madhyasthaḥ draṣṭā kartā ca
atha ke punar trayaḥ guṇāḥ iti ucyante
sattvam nāma pāṭava mārdava lāghava prasanna tā abhisaṅga prīti tuṣṭi anīhā santoṣa ādi lakṣaṇam ananta bhedam samāsatas sukha āvaham
rajaḥ nāma śoka tāpa kheda stambha udgama udvega roṣa māna ādi lakṣaṇam ananta bhedam samāsatas duḥkha āvaham

original: tamo nāmācchādanāvaraṇabībhatsadainyagauravālasyanidrāpramādādilakṣaṇamanantabhedaṃ samāsato mohātmakaṃ etat traiguṇyaṃ vyākhyātam //
analyzed: tamaḥ nāma ācchādana āvaraṇa bībhatsa dainya gaurava ālasya nidrā pramāda ādi lakṣaṇam ananta bhedam samāsatas moha ātmakam etat traiguṇyam vyākhyātam
sattvam prakāśakam vindyāt rajaḥ vindyāt pravartakam

original: vināśakaṃ tamo vindyāt traiguṇyaṃ nāma sañjñitam //
analyzed: vināśakam tamaḥ vindyāt traiguṇyam nāma sañjñitam
atra āha kaḥ sañcaraḥ pratisañcaraḥ ca iti

original: tatrotpattirnāmāvyaktāt samupadiṣṭāt sarvajagataḥ pareṇa rūpeṇādhiṣṭhānātmakāt mahān mahato 'haṃkāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra utpattiḥ nāma avyaktāt samupadiṣṭāt sarva jagataḥ pareṇa rūpeṇa adhiṣṭhāna ātmakāt mahān mahataḥ haṃkāraḥ

original: tatra vaikṛtādindriyāṇyutpadyante bhūtādestanmātrāṇi taijasādubhayam indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi ceti /
analyzed: tatra vaikṛtāt indriyāṇi utpadyante bhūtādeḥ tanmātrāṇi taijasāt ubhayam indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi ca iti

original: tato 'vyaktaṃ tu kvacinna līyate kasmāt anutpannatvāt /
analyzed: tatas vyaktam tu kvacid na līyate kasmāt anutpanna tvāt
atra āha kiṃvidham adhyātmam adhibhūtam adhidaivatam ca
evam eva trayodaśa karaṇasya adhyātmam adhibhūtam adhidaivam ca vyākhyātam
kāni catvāri iti atas āha ca iti
trīṇi guṇa rūpāṇi caturtham adhidaivatam iti arthaḥ

original: catvāri yo vedayate yathāvad guṇasvarūpāṇyadhidaivataṃ ca /
analyzed: catvāri yaḥ vedayate yathāvat guṇa svarūpāṇi adhidaivatam ca

original: vimuktapāpmā gatadoṣasaṅgo guṇāṃstu bhuṅkte na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate //
analyzed: vimukta pāpmā gata doṣa saṅgaḥ guṇān tu bhuṅkte na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate
atha kāḥ tāḥ abhibuddhayaḥ iti ucyante
buddhiḥ abhimānaḥ icchā kartavyam tad kriyā ca iti
idam karaṇīyam eti etad adhyavasāyaḥ buddhiḥ kriyā ātma parāmarśa svarūpa pratyayaḥ
abhimukhaḥ mānaḥ ham karomi iti ahaṃkāraḥ bhimānaḥ

original: kriyā etadvastusvarūpamiti kartavyālocanaṃ yadbuddhīndriyāṇāṃ sā kriyā /
analyzed: kriyā etat vastu svarūpam iti kartavya ālocanam yat buddhīndriyāṇām sā kriyā

original: itthametat kartavyamiti yatpravṛttiḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ sā kriyeti /
analyzed: ittham etat kartavyam iti yat pravṛttiḥ karmendriyāṇām sā kriyā iti
evam etā āha pañca abhibuddhayaḥ vyākhyātāḥ

original: dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā avividiṣā vividiṣā ceti pañca karmayonayaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā avividiṣā vividiṣā ca iti pañca karma yonayaḥ
vāci karmaṇi kāye ca pratītiḥ yābhiḥ ajyate
tad niṣṭhaḥ tad pratiṣṭhaḥ ca dhṛteḥ etat hi lakṣaṇam
sukha arthī yaḥ tu seveta vidyā karma tapāṃsi ca
prāyaścitta paraḥ nityam sukhā iyam parikīrtitā

original: ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca nityaṃ cedamacetanam /
analyzed: ekatvam ca pṛthaktvam ca nityam ca idam acetanam

original: sūkṣmaṃ satkāryamakṣobhyaṃ jñeyā vividiṣā hi sā //
analyzed: sūkṣmam satkāryam akṣobhyam jñeyā vividiṣā hi sā
kārya kāraṇa kṣama karā vividiṣā prākṛtikā vṛttiḥ

original: dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā avividiṣā catasro bandhāya vividiṣaikā mokṣāya iti pañca karmayonayo vyākhyātāḥ //
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhāḥ avividiṣā catasraḥ bandhāya vividiṣā ekā mokṣāya iti pañca karma yonayaḥ vyākhyātāḥ
atra āha ke te pañca vāyavaḥ

original: prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ pānaḥ samānaḥ ca udānaḥ vyānaḥ eva ca
iti ete vāyavaḥ pañca śarīreṣu śarīriṇām

original: tatra prāṇo nāma vāyuryo 'yaṃ mukhanāsikādhiṣṭhānaprāṇanāt krameṇānanāt prāṇa ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra prāṇaḥ nāma vāyuḥ yaḥ yam mukha nāsikā adhiṣṭhāna prāṇanāt krameṇa ānanāt prāṇaḥ iti abhidhīyate
apānaḥ nāma vāyuḥ nābheḥ adhiṣṭhātā apanayanāt adhas gamanāt ca apānaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: samāno nāma vāyurhṛdadhiṣṭhātā samanāt samagamanācca samāna ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: samānaḥ nāma vāyuḥ hṛd adhiṣṭhātā samanāt sama gamanāt ca samānaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: udāno nāma vāyuḥ kaṇṭhādhiṣṭhātā ūrdhvaṃ gamanācca udāna ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: udānaḥ nāma vāyuḥ kaṇṭha adhiṣṭhātā ūrdhvam gamanāt ca udānaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: vyāno nāma vāyuḥ sandhyadhiṣṭhātā prāṇādijṛmbhaṇācca vyāna ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: vyānaḥ nāma vāyuḥ sandhi adhiṣṭhātā prāṇa ādi jṛmbhaṇāt ca vyānaḥ iti abhidhīyate
āha ke te pañca karma ātmānaḥ ucyante
vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ bhūtādiḥ ca sa anumānaḥ niranumānaḥ ca iti
sa anumānaḥ śubha mūḍha karma kartā
iti ete pañca karma kartāraḥ vyākhyātāḥ
āha kā sā pañca parva avidyā iti
tamaḥ mohaḥ mahāmohaḥ tāmisraḥ ndhatāmisraḥ ca iti
tatra tamaḥ mohau ubhau etau aṣṭa ātmākau
tatra tamaḥ nāma aṣṭāsu prakṛtiṣu avyakta buddhi ahaṃkāra pañca tanmātra sañjñitāsu anātmasu ātma jñāna abhimānaḥ tamaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: moho nāmāṇimādyaṣṭāguṇaiśvaryaprāptaye yobhimāna utpadyate sa moha ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: mohaḥ nāma aṇima ādi aṣṭāguṇa aiśvarya prāptaye yaḥ abhimānaḥ utpadyate sa mohaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: mahāmoho nāma dṛṣṭānuśravikeṣu viṣayeṣu daśasu nivṛtteṣu mukto 'hamiti manyate sa mahāmoha ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: mahāmohaḥ nāma dṛṣṭa ānuśravikeṣu viṣayeṣu daśasu nivṛtteṣu muktaḥ ham iti manyate sa mahāmohaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: tāmisro nāma aṣṭaguṇaiśvarye 'ṇimādye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratihatasya duḥkhamutpadyate 'sau tāmisra ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: tāmisraḥ nāma aṣṭaguṇa aiśvarye ṇima ādye daśavidhe ca viṣaye pratihatasya duḥkham utpadyate sau tāmisraḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: andhatāmisro nāma aṇimādyaṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye siddhe maraṇakāle ca yo viṣādaḥ pratyapadyate so 'ndhatāmisra ityabhidhīyate /
analyzed: andhatāmisraḥ nāma aṇima ādi aṣṭaguṇa aiśvarye daśavidhe ca viṣaye siddhe maraṇa kāle ca yaḥ viṣādaḥ pratyapadyate saḥ ndhatāmisraḥ iti abhidhīyate
evam eṣā pañca parvā vidyā dviṣaṣṭi bhedā vyākhyātā
ekādaśa indriya vadhāḥ saptadaśa buddhi vadhāḥ

original: badhirastvakbadhiraḥ andhaḥ jaḍajihvaḥ ajighraḥ mūkaḥ kuṇiḥ paṅguḥ napuṃsakaḥ ūrdhvavāyuyuktaḥ amanāḥ /
analyzed: badhiraḥ tvac badhiraḥ andhaḥ jaḍa jihvaḥ ajighraḥ mūkaḥ kuṇiḥ paṅguḥ napuṃsakaḥ ūrdhva vāyu yuktaḥ amanāḥ
bādhiryam kuṣṭhita andhaḥ tvam jaḍa tā jighra tā tathā
mūka tā kauṇya paṅgu tvam klaibya udāvarta matta tāḥ
ete id indriya dvārāḥ buddheḥ eva vadhāḥ
navavidha tuṣṭi vaikalyāt aṣṭavidha asiddha vaikalyāt ca saptadaśa buddhi vadhāḥ iti aṣṭāviṃśatidhā aśaktiḥ
catasraḥ ādi ātmikyaḥ tuṣṭayaḥ bāhyāḥ pañca
ādyāḥ prakṛti upādāna kāla bhāgya ākhyāḥ

original: prakṛtyaiva muktiḥ kiṃ punaḥ sādhanairiti tuṣṭiḥ prakṛtyākhyā ambho nāma /
analyzed: prakṛtyā eva muktiḥ kim punar sādhanaiḥ iti tuṣṭiḥ prakṛti ākhyā ambhaḥ nāma
sādhanaiḥ saṃnyāsa ādibhiḥ upāttaiḥ tuṣṭiḥ sādhāna ākhyā salilam nāma

original: kālenaiva muktyādikaṃ setsyati kiṃ duḥkhaiḥ saṃnyāsādisādhanairiti tuṣṭiḥ kālākhyā 'gho nāma /
analyzed: kālena eva mukti ādikam setsyati kim duḥkhaiḥ saṃnyāsa ādi sādhanaiḥ iti tuṣṭiḥ kāla ākhyā ghaḥ nāma

original: yā tu bhāgyādeva sarvaṃ setsyati kiṃ sādhanādidhyānādikleśairiti sā bhāgyākhyā tuṣṭirnāma /
analyzed: yā tu bhāgyāt eva sarvam setsyati kim sādhana ādi dhyāna ādi kleśaiḥ iti sā bhāgya ākhyā tuṣṭiḥ nāma

original: bāhyāḥ śabdādiviṣayavairāgyāstuṣṭayaḥ arjanarakṣaṇakṣayabhogahiṃsādoṣadarśanaṃ vairāgyahetuḥ pañcavidhastadbhedena pañcatuṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: bāhyāḥ śabda ādi viṣaya vairāgyāḥ tuṣṭayaḥ arjana rakṣaṇa kṣaya bhoga hiṃsā doṣa darśanam vairāgya hetuḥ pañcavidhaḥ tad bhedena pañcatuṣṭayaḥ
tatas tarkeṇa artha parīkṣaṇam tāratāram nāma siddhiḥ
duḥkha traya vighātāḥ tāḥ trayaḥ mukhyāḥ siddhayaḥ
pramoda mudita moda nāma ākhyāḥ phalam iti aṣṭau siddhayaḥ
tuṣṭi siddhīnām viparyayāt saptadaśadhā vuddhi vadhāḥ
ke punar maulika arthāḥ katidhā ucyante
eka tvam arthavat tvam pārārthyam pradhānasya
anya tvam akartṛ tvam bahu tvam puruṣasya
astitvam yogaḥ viyogaḥ ca iti ubhayayoḥ
śeṣa vṛttiḥ pariśiṣṭa tvam pralaye tad ubhayayoḥ
pradhāna astitvam eka tvam arthavat tvam yathārtha tā

original: pārārthyaṃ ca tathā naikyaṃ viyogo yoga eva ca //
analyzed: pārārthyam ca tathā na aikyam viyogaḥ yogaḥ eva ca
śeṣa vṛttiḥ akartṛ tvam maulika arthāḥ smṛtāḥ daśa
anugṛhṇāti pratyaya bhūta ādi sargam yaḥ sargaḥ saḥ nugraha sargaḥ
liṅga deha āha sthūla dehāḥ sthūlabhūtāni ca
tatra liṅgam sthūla dehāt pūrvam utpannam avyāhatam sthūla nāśe pi anaśvaram
dharma adharma jñāna ajñāna vairāgya avairāgya aiśvarya anaiśvarya ākhya bhāva vāsitam saṃsarati
sthūlabhūtāni tu bhū gola samudra vahni śiśumāra brahmāṇḍa virāṭa ādīni
sthūla dehāḥ ke katividhāḥ ca iti ucyate

original: tatrāṣṭāvikalpo daivastairyagyonaḥ pañcadhā mānuṣya ekavidhaḥ brāhmaḥ prājāpatyaḥ paitre gāndharvo yākṣo rākṣasaḥ paiśācāśca daivasargaḥ paśumṛgasarīsṛpasthāvarāḥ  #
analyzed: tatra aṣṭa a vikalpaḥ daivaḥ tairyagyonaḥ pañcadhā mānuṣyaḥ ekavidhaḥ brāhmaḥ prājāpatyaḥ paitre gāndharvaḥ yākṣaḥ rākṣasaḥ paiśācāḥ ca daiva sargaḥ paśu mṛga sarīsṛpa sthāvarāḥ

original: brāhmaṇādijātibhede 'pi saṃsthāne viśeṣābhāvāt ekavidho mānuṣya iti caturdaśavidhāḥ sthūladehāḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādi jāti bhede pi saṃsthāne viśeṣa abhāvāt ekavidhaḥ mānuṣyaḥ iti caturdaśavidhāḥ sthūla dehāḥ

original: prakṛtimātmānaṃ jñātvā taccintanāt prākṛtikaḥ atrocyate pūrṇavarṣasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhantyavyaktacintakā iti /
analyzed: prakṛtim ātmānam jñātvā tad cintanāt prākṛtikaḥ atra ucyate pūrṇa varṣa sahasram tu tiṣṭhanti avyakta cintakāḥ iti
mahat ādīn ātma tvena jñātvā tad cintanāt vaikārikaḥ
daśa manvantarāṇi iha tiṣṭhanti indriya cintakāḥ
bhautikāḥ tu śatam pūrṇam sahasram ca abhimānikāḥ
bauddhāḥ daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti vigata jvarāḥ
iṣṭāpūrttī dakṣiṇā tad nimittaḥ dākṣaṇikaḥ atra ucyate
svarga sthāḥ narakam yānti nārakāḥ ca triviṣṭapam iti
gata āgatam kāma kāmāḥ labhante iti ca

original: ata eva hi triṣvapi bandheṣu ekaikāpāye tatastato mokṣa iti /
analyzed: atas eva hi triṣu api bandheṣu ekaika apāye tatas tatas mokṣaḥ iti

original: prākṛtena ca bandhena tathā vaikārikeṇa ca /
analyzed: prākṛtena ca bandhena tathā vaikārikeṇa ca
dakṣiṇābhiḥ tṛtīyena vṛddhaḥ na anyena mucyate

original: tatra pramāṇaṃ kiṃ katividhama vā ucyate trividhaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: tatra pramāṇam kim katividham vā ucyate trividham pramāṇam
artha sannikṛṣṭa indriya jaḥ niścayaḥ dṛṣṭam
indriyāṇi pañca cakṣuḥ ādīni manaḥ ca
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā jñāna pūrvakam anumānam
pūrvavat yathā kardamena pūrva vṛtta vṛṣṭi anumānam
kṣāram upalabhya śeṣasya api kṣāra tva anumānam
rūpa ādi upalabhya tad upalabdheḥ kāraṇasya anumānam
rūpa ādi upalabdhayaḥ karaṇa sādhyāḥ kriya tvāt chidi kriyā vat
yathārtha vākya ja artha viṣaya udhyavasāyaḥ iti yāvat
prāvāduka udbhāvitānām tu upamāna artha āpatti sambhava abhāva aitihya pratibhānām iti ukteṣu eva antarbhāvaḥ
yat tat yathā gauḥ gavayaḥ tathā iti vākyam

original: gavayepi gosadṛśasya gavayaśabdo vācaka iti pratyayaḥ soyamanumānametatsaṅketagraharūpatvāt /
analyzed: gavaye api go sadṛśasya gavaya śabdaḥ vācakaḥ iti pratyayaḥ saḥ uyam anumānam etat saṅketa graha rūpa tvāt
yat gavayasya cakṣuḥ sannikṛṣṭa go sādṛśya jñānam tat pratyakṣam eva

original: ata eva smaryamāṇāyāṃ gavi sādṛśyajñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: atas eva smaryamāṇāyām gavi sādṛśya jñānam pratyakṣam
go gavayayoḥ sādṛśyasya gavaya antara vartti bhūyas vayava sāmānya rūpasya yoga rūpasya ekatvāt iti upamānam na māna antaram
jīvataḥ gṛha abhāva darśanena bahirbhāva kalpanāt iti arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva
sambhavaḥ api khārī ādau droṇa āḍhaka prastha ādi avagama rūpaḥ numānam eva

original: iha bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyādirabhāvāvagamo 'pi pratyakṣameveti nābhāvaḥ pṛthak pramāṇam /
analyzed: iha bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti ityādiḥ abhāva avagamaḥ pratyakṣam eva iti na abhāvaḥ pṛthak pramāṇam
anirdiṣṭa pravaktṛkam pravāda mātram aitihyam api iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti apramāṇam eva
āpta mūla tve tu āgamaḥ eva

original: dvāravatī puṇyabhūmiriti śruteḥ tatra vasataḥ śreyāṃsastatra gamane puṇyaṃ bhavatītyādibuddhirjāyamānā pratibhā /
analyzed: dvāravatī puṇya bhūmiḥ iti śruteḥ tatra vasataḥ śreyāṃsaḥ tatra gamane puṇyam bhavati ityādi buddhiḥ jāyamānā pratibhā
anuktam api ūhati paṇḍitaḥ janaḥ iti
yā pratibhā sā api anumānam eva
trayoviṃśati sūtraiḥ hi sarva śāstra artha saṃgrahaḥ
kṛtaḥ muni vareṇa atra yathāmati sacīvṛtaḥ
iti sāṃkhyasūtra vivaraṇa ākhyā kāpilasūtra vṛttiḥ samāptā
